Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Pamene thambo lidzang’ambika
Pamene nyenyezi zidzagwa ndi kubalalitsidwa
Ndi pamene nyanja zikuluzikulu zidzaphulika
Pamene manda adzatseguka
Pamenepo Mzimu uliwonse udzadziwa chimene udatumiza ndi chimene udasiya m’mbuyo
oh Iwe munthu! Kodi ndi chiyani chikukunamiza kuti usiye kutsatira malamulo a Ambuye wako Wolemekezeka
Amene adakulenga iwe ndi kukukonza kuti uzioneka bwino monga mmene uonekeramu
Ndi nkhope ina iliyonse imene idamukondweretsa anakulenga iwe
Iyayi! Koma inu mukukana kuti kudzakhala tsiku lachiweruzo
Koma pakati panu pali ena amene ali kukuyang’anirani
Olemekezeka ndi odziwa kulemba
Iwo amadziwa chilichonse chimene mumachita
Ndithudi anthu onse angwiro adzakhala mu mtendere
Ndipo, ndithudi, anthu onse oipa adzakhala ku Gahena
Imene iwo adzalowako ndi kulawa malawi ake patsiku lachiweruzo
Iwo sadzatha kuthawa ayi
Kodi chidzakuuza ndi chiani za tsiku lachiweruzo
Tinenanso kodi chidzakuuza ndi chiani za tsiku lachiweruzo
Ndi tsiku limene mzimu uliwonse sudzatha kuthandiza wina aliyense ndipo Mulungu yekha ndiye amene adzaweruza
Tsoka kwa iwo onse amene amagulitsa malonda awo monyenga
Iwo amene amati ena akamawayesera zinthu amafuna kuti zikwanire muyeso wake
Koma pamene iwo ayesa kapena awayesera anthu ena amawanyenga
Kodi iwo saganiza kuti adzaukitsidwa kwa akufa
Patsiku lalikulu
Tsiku limene anthu a mitundu yonse adzaima pamaso pa Ambuye wa zolengedwa zonse
